import { Fragment, useRef } from "react"; import { Dialog, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import PropsType from "prop-types"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; const Indicator = ({ open}) => { const cancelButtonRef = useRef(null); return ReactDOM.createPortal( {}} >

, document.getElementById("app-indicator") ); }; Indicator.propsType = { open: PropsType.bool, }; export default Indicator;
